Welcome to our book!  

We are a community of teachers and educators of computer programming outside of traditional computer science settings. Our 300+ members around the world meet every year for a [Winter School](https://pairprogramming.ed.ac.uk/category/winter-school/) and co-author a [book called Teaching Programming across Disciplines](https://pairprogramming.ed.ac.uk/join-book/) (this very book). 

Our book is an edited, open-access volume comprised of many short chapters written by groups of authors.
